types.html:
pantalon de clown m (plural pantalons de clown)

  1. (Quebec politics) Camo pants (pants with patterns typical of military camouflage) of a random assortment of colours, worn as a protest against government and contract terms, by uniformed employees, in violation of uniform dress codes
  2. clown pants

Synonyms

[edit]
  • (Europe): pantalon clown
trans: Camo pants  of a random assortment of colours, worn as a protest against government and contract terms, by uniformed employees, in violation of uniform dress codes

title: pantalon de clown
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pɑ̃.ta.lɔ̃ də klun/
